name: DISH
0:
”Alexa, change the channel to HGTV”
”Alexa, show me Tom Hanks movies”
”Alexa, launch Game Finder”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa lets you control your DISH Hopper DVR with just your voice. Go hands-free and tell Alexa what you want to watch. You can ask Alexa to change the channel; search for your favorite shows; play your recorded content; pause, fast-forward, or rewind through your favorite shows; launch apps; navigate to specific menus; and start recordings, all with your voice!
 
Try saying
"Alexa, turn on Dish” or turn on <device name>
“Alexa, tune to HGTV”
“Alexa, change the channel to 112”
“Alexa, show me Tom Hanks movies”
“Alexa, skip forward 2 minutes”
“Alexa, pause”
“Alexa, record this”
“Alexa, launch Game Finder”
“Alexa, go to Live TV”
“Alexa, go to my DVR”
 
Supported devices: Hopper 3™, Hopper® with Sling®, Hopper Duo®, Hopper®, All Joey® Receivers and Wally™
 
For additional information and getting started help, visit dish.com/alexa-integration
